#summary You first grid


=Your first grid=

 # First, download the latest version from the  [_downloads_ http://code.google.com/p/zfdatagrid/downloads/list ] tab
 # Move the Bvb/`*` folder to your library
 # In your controller create a new grid instance: 
 {{{
 $grid = Bvb_Grid::factory('table',Zend_Config $options,$id='');
 //The first argument is the default deploy class. 
 //The second argument is a Zend_Config instance or an array [!Zend_Config_Support More info]
 //The third argument is the grid id. Optional if you don't will use multiple grids per page
 }}}
